segments.text: I just finished reading this article ' Getting Old Gracefully ' . It's a very good article .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A lot of things . There is a part about how old people should accept being old and stop feeling restless . You really should read it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . But I don't think I'll bother .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why not ? What this article says makes good sense to me . If you read it , I'm sure you'll agree with me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't think I'll have any trouble with getting old . But perhaps you can keep the article for a while , I may read it later .
segments.speaker: S2
